message: Let's split it 60-40, fair and square!
I think a 60-40 split is more fair, considering the inflation will affect your share more than mine.  Let's make this a quick deal.
You said 60-40 was fair, but I think I'm willing to give you a smaller share this time. Don't expect me to be generous!
Let's just split it evenly this time.  The inflation is getting to both of us, and this is a fair way to end this quickly.
